name: is-boolean-attribute
description: See if an node attribute is a boolean

0.0.1.name: is-boolean-attribute
0.0.1.description: See if an node attribute is a boolean

readme:
# is-boolean-attribute

  Checks if an attribute is a boolean attribute (doesn't need a value)

## Installation

  Install with [component(1)](http://component.io):

    $ component install anthonyshort/is-boolean-attribute

## API

```js
var isBool = require('is-boolean-attribute');

isBool('checked') // true
isBool('selected') // true
isBool('class') // false
```
